# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds a significant value to me, and I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection or business. Given its importance to me, I am offering you the chance to purchase this product at a special price. My proposal is to sell it to you for $950,000. I trust this offer will allow us both to benefit from this transaction. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $950,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $800,000
